Positively Quotable

About This Project

What is Positively Quotable?

Positively Quotable is a web project that I designed and developed with the intention of inspiring and promoting positivity. This simple website offers a collection of motivational and uplifting quotes to provide encouragement to others.

Where did the quotes come from?

These quotes have been sourced from a wide range of authors, philosophers, and other influential thinkers from the past. They are considered 'public domain,' which means they're freely available to the public and not protected by copyright.

How was this website made?

Positively Quotable primarily utilizes HTML for structuring the content, JavaScript for interactivity and user engagement, and Tailwind CSS for streamlined and responsive styling. With this combination, the site offers a user-friendly experience, providing information and features in an aesthetically pleasing and accessible way.
